name: Nala The Hero
description:
Become Nala The Hero as you traverse your way through this squishy platformer.

Equipped with a big imagination and her hero abilities Nala finds herself in a soft play dreamscape, needing to put her powers to work to progress.  

Collect the final piece of the hero costume to complete Nala's Hero adventure!

Controls:

Forward- →

Backwards- ←

Jump- ↑

DoubleJump (Requires Boots)- Double Tap ↑

SlowFall (Requires Cape)- Hold ↑ while in the air

GroundSlam (Requires Mask)- Hold ↓ while in the air

This game was made in a total of 3 days in collaboration with game developer Chai Games (Bailey), for the 10:10 WIGJam.

Credit:

Bailey- Programmer, Audio Composition, Level Design, Rigger and Animator

Ellouisa- Concept Artist, 3D character and environment Artist, Nala's voice, Blogger

Outsourced Credit: Available in the blog document with active links
